content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function with derivative given by <math alttext="f prime of x, equals, x squared, minus, open parenthesis, a, plus b, close parenthesis, times x, plus, a, b, which equals, open parenthesis, x minus a, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x minus b, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are constants such that <math alttext="a, is less than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="a, less than x is less than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="a, less than x is less than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than a," display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x greater than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x less than a," display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x greater than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than, the fraction with numerator a, plus b, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x less than, the fraction with numerator a, plus b, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than, the fraction with numerator a, plus b, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f double prime of x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x less than, the fraction with numerator a, plus b, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="a, less than x is less than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="a, less than x is less than b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></math>.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
